### [Instance Properties](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation#2862760)

[`activeHeight`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505946-activeheight)Number of visible pixel rows.[`activeWidth`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505617-activewidth)Number of pixels visible per row.[`bitsPerComponent`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1506162-bitspercomponent)Number of bits per component in each pixel.[`bitsPerPixel`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505957-bitsperpixel)The number of bits per pixel, including unused bits and alpha.[`bytesPerPlane`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505598-bytesperplane)Not used.[`bytesPerRow`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505591-bytesperrow)The number of bytes per row.[`componentCount`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505140-componentcount)One for indexed pixels, three for direct pixel formats.[`componentMasks`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505522-componentmasks)Mask of the bits valid for each component of the pixel - in R, G, B order for direct pixels.[`flags`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505778-flags)None defined - set to zero.[`pixelFormat`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505071-pixelformat)String description of the pixel format - IO32BitDirectPixels, IO16BitDirectPixels etc.[`pixelType`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505700-pixeltype)One of kIOCLUTPixels (indexed pixels with changeable CLUT), kIORGBDirectPixels (direct pixels).[`reserved`](/documentation/iokit/iopixelinformation/1505942-reserved)Set to zero.
